storyName: Let the Light of the Past Die
storyInfo: The compass repairs do not go well. The sailors plan a mutiny. Thorns kills the sword-wielding Seaborn under Juana's direction and learns the sword technique that fights the wind and waves.

attributes.content: Wow, this is way more dangerous than your experiments at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You used to blow up your lab like three or four times a day, at most. Now, you're doing it once every fifteen minutes.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: That's not the kind of data I want...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Don't worry, I made detailed records of all your experiments so far. Clean the desk up, won't you, Peludita?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Sure thing!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: What is she doing here?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I felt like I could use an assistant myself. Don't worry, she's clever and hardworking enough.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (And you're making me do all your work!)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Ahem. How about you go fetch some fin oil and Oriron from the warehouse?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: On it!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Alright, she's gone...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Now, what's the problem we're dealing with?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: We're not making much progress... The samples that I've managed to construct are well below the required standard.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Really? They look good though. Nice and shiny.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: There's a reason Corazonix is so rare. Its incredible powers are supported by an extraordinarily complex structure.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Either I'm not doing this right, or my understanding of Corazonix is completely wrong.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I'm not ready to manipulate true Corazonix, not even close.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: So why not make more samples until you're satisfied with them?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Our resources are limited, I can't use them all... If I fail, I at least want to leave some behind for them.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You've barely started and you're already thinking about your inevitable failure. Come on, have some faith in yourself.
attributes.name: Elysium
Elysium
attributes.content: We've worked together so many times. I have faith in you. So does Señora Juana, and, er... er...

attributes.name: Elysium
attributes.content: ...Who else was there again?
Well, that certain someone, at least...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: And me.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Oh, hey there, Peludita. You're back already?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I, for one, am rooting for your success.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: What's in it for you, Pascuala?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Don't forget I was the one who brought this compass here. If you screw this up, I'm screwed too.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: So, don't send me away again when you run into trouble. I'll do what I can to help.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: ...Well, to start with, you could help by not selling me out this time.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Tch, believe what you want...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Ahem. Anyway, thanks for running that errand. I'm going to adjust the direction of the transmutation table. Could you sort out the ingredients?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Fine, fine.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (All you do is nag!)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Come in!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Sorry to interrupt. There's something I want to ask.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: The transmission core on one of the salt ships just broke, and we couldn't find any material strong enough... I get that the boss gave you those materials for the compass, but we just need a little...
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: How much?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: One hundred grams.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Pascuala will fetch it.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: (Whisper) Are you kidding me? That's everything we've got!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Go.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Just go. We don't need it for the experiments just yet.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Muchas gracias. Sorry for asking at a time like this. Señora Juana said the compass takes priority over everything else...
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: The future of the whole fleet is on you.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Isidro?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Please don't say that.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: ...Is it not going well?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Don't you worry, señora. It's only been a few days! He's feeling stressed, that's all.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: If you ask me, it's a good thing! Nothing like a little pressure to keep you sharp.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Word of advice, Isidro. Whatever happens in the lab, good or bad, don't tell a soul.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Resentment towards Juana has been growing for years due to her radical decisions. Many are watching closely, waiting for the slightest slip-up.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Waiting for their chance to take the leadership from her.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: I didn't realize there would be so many complications when I agreed to repair the compass.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: What about you, Señora Teach?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Are you one of the people watching?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Of course I'm watching you, chaval. But I don't give a sandfin's ass about the compass, I only care about Juana.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: If you fail, it's up to me to keep her safe, and...
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: And what?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: And keep you all from being torn to pieces by a horde of angry pirates.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: This is a pirate ship, and don't you forget that.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Thorns...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Isidro does not answer. His expression is grave, and the shadows on his face hang like heavy curtains in the night.
Several pirates are still working under the dim lamplight. They look up at the pair with probing gazes as they walk by.
Isidro has never felt so intently that his every move is being watched.
If you're starting to have second thoughts, I've got your back.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Whisper) I'm sure the two of us could slip out by ourselves, no problem.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...Sorry to drag you into this, Elysium.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Oh, spare me, I chose to come here.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I just wanted to help them find a way out. Maybe satisfy my own desires along the way...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: But things are far more complicated than I thought. Far too many people have placed their hopes in me, in this compass.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Some of those hopes are even contradictory. Some want me to succeed, some want me to fail, others want me to do nothing at all.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I don't like it.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I feel you, amigo.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But that's how people are. Anything you do is inevitably going to affect someone else. Not saying you need to feel responsible, but it couldn't hurt to give it some thought.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: The whole thing makes my head hurt... I'd much rather be working alone.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You haven't been alone for a long time now, buddy.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You really gave Teach all the sinew?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...Did Pascuala tell you?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Oh, you needn't worry about that. I certainly didn't order her to show up at your lab.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I realize you'd rather not be bothered. I just felt compelled to check on your progress.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Do you need more sinew?
attributes.name: Juana
Isidro
attributes.content: Unless my eyes deceived me, that wasn't saltfin sinew... That was taken from Seaborn.

attributes.name: Isidro
attributes.content: But I thought you wiped out the Seaborn on the Salt Flat.
Wait... are you going to kill it? But...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: ...Come with me.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Cruz would have done the same.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I told you Juana wouldn't listen.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: I know...
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: I did it to keep her from learning about your conversation with the shipwrights. She was going to talk to them yesterday.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: We simply talked about work. What's there to hide?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Teach may not have realized, but I have. It doesn't take that much sinew to fix a transmission core.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: ...So you knew all along?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: What are your next plans?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: The compass repairs will grind to a halt without enough materials.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Juana won't stop just because of a little material shortage. She'll go get more with the kid.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: I heard it was taken from the sea monsters Captain Cruz killed... but there aren't any sea monsters around anymore.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: No, there are... I've seen it.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: So... the rumors were true?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Doesn't matter anymore. What matters is what we can do while she's gone.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Hey, Peludita, have you seen Thorns?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Did he head to the lab already? At this hour?
attributes.name: Elysium
Pascuala
attributes.content: *yawn*

attributes.name: Pascuala
attributes.content: No clue. He didn't come back last night.
You waited all night for him?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Not me, Nene. It laid down at the door and didn't budge all night.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (Shakes tail anxiously)
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: That's odd. I'll check out the lab. Go get some sleep.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Can't work without sleep. No point trying to play it tough; I'll wake you up if there's anything.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Did he really think I could fall asleep at a time like this? That guy's loco.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Um, excuse me? Are you looking for someone?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Is Pascuala here?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: The sound of clashing swords echoes through the cave. Isidro slices a sharp arc in the air, cutting cleanly through the Seaborn's flesh.
Yet, the creature is relentless, its appendages flailing wildly. Blades embedded within its limbs streak across the air like shooting stars.
A fencer's rapier, a bladecaster's sword-wand, a knight's great sword, an assassin's dagger, a samurai's katana... one after another, they rush towards Isidro, threatening to overwhelm his vision.
Finally, there is a pirate's cutlass, screaming as it cuts through the air, as if battling the wind and waves, like in the legends.
Hmph...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Gugh...
attributes.name: Sword-wielding Seaborn

attributes.content: I used to ask myself every day... why wasn't I the one who was devoured?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: This was your burden to bear... so why leave it to me?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You were the one who should have sat in the captain's chair, and I should have been your helmswoman, drenched from head to toe by the ocean's spray.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Oh, how I've loathed you for this, Cruz.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: The night wind of the Salt Flat carries the familiar smell of brine.
A single tear falls from the corner of Juana's eye, scattered by the wind before it hits the ground.
Your swordplay has already improved tremendously. I thought it would take more time.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: For what? I'd have joined you in that cave, if I weren't recovering from my injuries.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...Were you crying?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: What did I tell you about asking a lady a question she'd rather not answer?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...My apologies.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: There's no need to feel bad. I was planning to ask you to kill hi—it eventually, once you were strong enough.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: We just moved up the schedule. You must be incredibly talented with a blade to have accomplished it so soon.
attributes.name: Juana
Isidro
attributes.content: It... had a sword with the name Cruz on it.

attributes.name: Isidro
attributes.content: I thought you should have it.
I... still haven't delivered the killing blow.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You can still say goodbye, if you want.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Gracias.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: The Seaborn writhes, its appendages twitching as swords scrape dully against one another.
But this sound soon fades, along with the Seaborn's feeble breathing. Juana knows that the last vestige of its life is slipping away.
With its last bit of strength, it lifts itself from the ground, using the swords impaling it as support.
I'm sorry for imprisoning you in this cave for so long.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Your suffering will end soon.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I'm glad I met that boy, so you could meet your end by the sword in an honorable duel.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Rather than being put down as a monster...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: So many have failed... but he succeeded.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: If he's willing to go out to sea with us, surely he would be your equal as captain.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Juana approaches the creature, places a hand upon its smooth face, and gazes into its clouded eyes.
It struggles as it senses her approach, but its once-strong appendages betray it, and it falls to the ground.
Juana holds its head and places it upon her knees.
The light-emitting organ on its forehead dims. Juana is reminded of that night many years ago, when she saw a tiny sailboat from beneath the surface.
On that boat stood a young man, gazing curiously into the water, lamp in hand.
May your soul be freed from the Salt Flat, and return to the ocean with the clouds and rain.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: May we meet again on the boundless ocean.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Farewell, my love.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Juana feels a stinging pain in her chest. This is good. It is a sign that she still lives, and has not been numbed over the past century.
Deep in the ocean, in an Ægir city, the years pass like a single day.
Deep in the Salt Flat, in an Iberian settlement, life is bland as water.
It is only upon the waves, in strife and struggle, that her blood flows, that her heart beats.
It is only then that she feels hunger, the desire to take a bite out of tomorrow, and cough violently at its taste.
She will bite out the shape of the future, one mouthful at a time, and down it with bitter brine.
Let go of me, you piece of finshit!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Juana and Isidro will have you all killed when they see what you're doing to me!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Shut her up.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Finshit... mmph, nnf!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: I've sent out word, Rus. The escort will be ready soon. You leave with the chica.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: I'll look for the compass in the boss's room and catch up once I find it.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Er, I'm not quite sure I understand what's going on here. Is this a mutiny?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Could somebody explain things to me?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Do we hand him over too?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Aye.
attributes.name: Javier
Elysium
attributes.content: Thorns won't...

attributes.name: Elysium
attributes.content: I... mmph, nnf!
Finally, some peace and quiet.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Mmpf...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (Pokes head out from under the table)
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: (C'mon... over here...)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: She tries to signal it with her eyes, but Rus and Javier's footsteps send it back into hiding.
She grits her teeth and opens her eyes wide, trying to put on the fiercest look she can muster to scare it into coming out.
What? Salt got in your eyes?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Just leave her be.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Wish I could, but the way she's scrunching her face is an eyesore.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Mmph?!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Mmph—!!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Hmph, nothing...
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Lemme take a look.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: As Rus approaches, Pascuala struggles even harder against her fetters.
That is, until she catches a glimpse of Elysium slowly edging towards the table, and the saltfin beneath.
She stops struggling and keeps her gaze firmly on the duo in front of her, doing her utmost not to avert her eyes even a little bit.
Nene? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Mmph!
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: What's this on your fin?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: That's... Elysium's flag. Something must have happened back at the fleet.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Let's hurry!
attributes.name: Juana
